casebody.data:
The State ex rel. Walsh, Appellant, v. R.G. Smith Company et al., Appellees.

[Cite as State ex rel. Walsh v. R.G. Smith Co. (1998), 83 Ohio St.3d 145.]

(No. 96-2652 Submitted July 8, 1998 Decided September 16, 1998.) Zwick Law Offices Co., L.P.A., and James P. Proctor, for appellant. Krugliak, Wilkins, Griffiths & Dougherty Co., L.P.A., David E. Butz and Edward D. Murray, for appellee R.G. Smith Co. Betty D. Montgomery, Attorney General, and Cecille Caluya Harris, Assistant Attorney General, for appellee Industrial Commission.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed consistent with the opinion of the court of appeals.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
